Summary: Oval white shaped UFO spotted near Farmersville, TX in broad daylight
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving from Wylie, TX to Farmersville, TX heading North on Hwy 78 around noon. I was driving my SUV and friend was in the passenger's seat. I was about 3 miles from Farmersville and I happened to glance to my left and noticed a white object in the sky. It was not a plane or bird and I kept wondering what the heck it was. It appeared and disappered a few times. I kept asking my friend if she saw it and at first she said no. I slowed down to about 10 miles an hour and while I was looking West she finally saw it appear North of us and then it was gone. The object was a white skinny oval is the best I can describe it.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Farmersville
There were no other sightings in Farmersville on or around April 26th 2008
